########## Plot the CDF of LB Scores ##########

# Arrange the data for PDF and CDF
count, bins_count = np.histogram(score_vector, bins=100)
  # Find the PDF of the data using count values
pdf = count / sum(count)
  # Calculate the CDF
cdf = np.cumsum(pdf)
  # Plotting the PDF and the CDF:
#plt.plot(bins_count[1:], pdf, color="red", label="PDF")
plt.plot(bins_count[1:], cdf, label="CDF")
plt.xlabel("Score")
plt.legend()
